title: How long did it take you to find "your" champion?
body:
I don't mean a champion that is just really strong and you just so happen to be playing them or using a build made by some Diamond 1/Challenger player but a champion that when you play as them, everything is going to be ok just because you got your favorite champion. 

I've been playing League for 10 months now and i found out my champion was J4 during Ascension. With CC, range, damage and tankyness. J4 turned out to be my new main. 

It only took me 9 months to find this out. 
Hell, a child could of been born during the time I first played League and started playing J4.
